citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00pm on
24-May-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility and was told by a family member that the licensee was not available.

narrative:
